sections.heading: to 63-8-7 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1998, ch. 108, § 81 repealed 63-8-1 through 63-8-7 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1955, ch. 43, §§ 1-7, relating to health and safety of railroad employees, effective January 1, 1999. For provisions of former sections,seethe 1998 NMSA onNMOneSource.com.
